Title: Early-season heat dome brings highest temperatures in years to parts of Eastern US
Description: An intense and nearly historic weather pattern is cooking much of America under a dangerous heat dome this week with triple-digit temperatures in places that haven't been so hot in more than a decade.

Title: Purple Heart Army veteran self-deports after nearly 50 years in the U.S.
Description:
Sae Joon Park left for South Korea on Monday.
His removal order was the result of drug possession and bail jumping charges from over 15 years ago — offenses that, he said, stemmed from untreated PTSD.
